ygData.subject: Re: exp gain
ygData.msgSnippet: All races other than humans have increased exp penalities, as do hybrid classes. Unfortunately it is very very difficult to measure this with any amount of
ygData.messageBody:
All races other than humans have increased exp penalities,
as do hybrid classes.

Unfortunately it is very very difficult to measure this with any
amount of precision, so I do not think anyone except the
programmers have any clear idea on what the actual amounts are.

Human Paladin vs Dwarven Warrior is a tossup - the human
gets higher xp because he is a hybrid, the dwarf gets higher
xp because he is a dwarf.

It is safe to say that a Human Warrior will level faster than a
Dwarven Paladin though.





"Blizzard" <blizzard15@...> on 15/09/99 12:26:50

Please respond to EverQuest@onelist.com

To: everquest@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Michael Wyatt/AU/AMP)
Subject: [EverQuest] exp gain



Does anyone know if the exp bonus for humans is more then the penalties for the
hybrids? For example, would a human paladin level faster or slower then say a
dwarven warrior? I'm not lookin for a for sure answer, just what you guys think.
Thanks for your time.

Kendan
